name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where a malicious actor executed scripts to exploit vulnerabilities on a critical server.

action--e99c0a6d-f1b3-4df4-83de-b1671b8b.name: Kill malicious process
action--e99c0a6d-f1b3-4df4-83de-b1671b8b.description: Terminate the malicious script process if it exists.

action--f80c6f43-9b82-43a7-8c8b-0a96bc9b.name: Isolate affected host from the network
action--f80c6f43-9b82-43a7-8c8b-0a96bc9b.description: Isolate the affected host to prevent further exploitation.

parallel--a72c0d65-2c0c-45e2-b87e-0eb78c.name: Follow-up Actions
parallel--a72c0d65-2c0c-45e2-b87e-0eb78c.description: Perform follow-up actions after process termination or isolation.

action--c76b3d04-e403-40f1-9e73-ea02f53f.name: Run malware scan
action--c76b3d04-e403-40f1-9e73-ea02f53f.description: Perform a malware scan on the isolated host.

while-condition--e91a2ba3-e0b2-4fa1-9d91.name: Malware Scan Loop
while-condition--e91a2ba3-e0b2-4fa1-9d91.description: Repeat malware scanning until the system is clean.

action--93c1c44e-2470-451d-bb59-d5c121e4.name: Notify incident response team
action--93c1c44e-2470-451d-bb59-d5c121e4.description: Send a notification to the incident response team.

commands.command: send-notification --team 'Incident Response' --message 'Malicious activity detected on host-45.'

action--7cb4654e-d2a0-4872-8faf-7907c6b8.name: Review logs for other affected hosts
action--7cb4654e-d2a0-4872-8faf-7907c6b8.description: Check the logs for suspicious activities.
